creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: forty lines of very small, compactly written and spaced calligraphy; last few lines have even smaller characters; rectangular relief stamp URC; two square intaglio stamps at L edge; mounted on jet black board
markings: URC, rectangular relief stamp; L edge, two square intaglio stamps; on back of mount, LRQ, in pencil: [Shochiku]
title: Poem
